## v3.CoreV3.init property

init means enable TeamsFx feature for current project folder. There are two cases: 1. Init in an empty folder 2. Init in existing project folder Whether current folder is empty or not, core will create ".fx" folder and "templates" folder with necessary files, similar to what "git init" command do.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
init: (inputs: InputsWithProjectPath) => Promise<Result<Void, FxError>>;
```
